greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Compound filter (3-adic valuation & the length of rightmost run of 1's in base-2): a(n) = P(A051064(n), A089309(n)), where P(n,k) is sequence A000027 used as a pairing function.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Pairing Function
program: from sympy import divisors, divisor_count, mobius
def a051064(n): return -sum([mobius(3*d)*divisor_count(n/d) for d in divisors(n)])
def a089309(n): return  0 if n==0 else v(n/2**v(n) + 1)
def T(n, m): return ((n + m)**2 - n - 3*m + 2)/2
def a(n): return T(a051064(n), a089309(n)) # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 11 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 10 2017
